alert.note: Alert for South End Sierra Foothills; South End of the Lower Sierra; South End of the Upper Sierra; Southeast San Joaquin Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 4:59PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHERN KERN AND SOUTH CENTRAL TULARE COUNTIES THROUGH 530 PM PDT... At 457 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm southwest of Johnsondale, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail, and isolated heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Localized heavy rainfall could lead to nuisance flooding. Locations impacted include... Southwest of Johnsondale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: South End Sierra Foothills; South End of the Lower Sierra; South End of the Upper Sierra; Southeast San Joaquin Valley
